links: P. A. MacMahon, Perpetual reciprocants, Proc. London Math. Soc., 17 (1886), 139-151; Coll. Papers II, pp. 584-596.
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1, 1, 0, 0, -2, 0, 0, 1, 1, -1).
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[1,0,1,1,1,0,1,-1,-1,-3]; [n le 10 select I[n] else Self(n-1)+Self(n-2)-2*Self(n-5)+Self(n-8)+Self(n-9)-Self(n-10): n in [1..60]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 23 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 17 2001
